meanings.definition: To be the male parent of
meanings.sent2: The man fathered a son and two daughters.
meanings.sent3: The fathered puppies were all adopted by loving families.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom fathered many successful business ventures.
meanings.sent5: The old oak tree fathered a whole forest of saplings.

meanings.sent1: She fathered a new approach to problem-solving.
meanings.sent2: The artist fathered a unique style of painting.
meanings.sent3: The chef fathered a delicious new recipe that became an instant hit.
meanings.sent4: Her passion fathered a movement for positive change in the community.
meanings.sent5: The inventor fathered a groundbreaking technology that revolutionized the industry.
